deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data.
deleteAccount.warning: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.confirmationText: To confirm, type DELETE in the field below
deleteAccount.success: Your account has been successfully deleted
deleteAccount.error: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again.

motivationalMessages.message1: Mastering your finances starts with understanding them. Begin today
motivationalMessages.message2: Clear insight into your accounts is the foundation of strong financial health
motivationalMessages.message3: Managing money wisely is an investment in your future freedom
motivationalMessages.message4: Controlling your finances means controlling your future. Take the first step
motivationalMessages.message5: Every mindful financial decision brings you closer to your goals
motivationalMessages.message6: Financial stability isn't accidental. It's built consistently over time
motivationalMessages.message7: Today is the best day to take control of your financial wellbeing
motivationalMessages.message8: Know your numbers. Make informed decisions. Move forward with confidence
motivationalMessages.message9: Financial progress starts with clarity, discipline, and decisive action
motivationalMessages.message10: Taking charge of your finances is taking charge of your life
